org.hawaiiframework.async.timeout

Class TaskRemoveStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hawaiiframework.async.timeout.TaskRemoveStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TaskAbortStrategy

    public class TaskRemoveStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements TaskAbortStrategy
    Removes the scheduled task from the executor's queue.
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Rutger Lubbers, Paul Klos
